AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.p1: "Sarnitsa Milk" Ltd. is a dairy processing enterprise established in 2018 in the town of Sarnitsa. The town is located in the heart of the Rhodope Mountains and is known for its clean and beautiful nature. The enterprise is built and equipped according to all modern requirements for the production of high-quality and safe food products.
AboutPage.p2: The main goal of the company is the production of high-quality dairy products using traditional Bulgarian technologies that satisfy even the most refined taste. For this purpose, only 100% Bulgarian cow's milk is used, sourced from elite farms. A HACCP system for quality and food safety control and management has been implemented.
